formalpara.title: NAFCSR.ONT.INSTALLATION.Diagnostics
formalpara.para: Sets the list of tests that are offered by the @@FieldAppName@@ for ONT Installation jobs. The contents of this variable should be a comma-separated list of test modules to run when an ONT is installed. The default value is NAF_TopologyValidation, NAF_ONTDiscovery, NAF_ONTActivation, NAF_PowerBudget, NAF_PONDiagnostics.
